ygData.messageBody:
I'm gonna cheat and use his spolier space...

>"Put the enchanted electrum bar +
>hilt into the mold and hit combine to make the wakizashi, "
>

>where do you get enchanted electrum bar ? is it exspensive ?

Talk to your local Enchanter..... *grin*

>and eventhough you're quoting this so you might not know. What if you don't
>have a good smithing skill. does that matter whether or not the blade will
>come out?

I have a feeling this is not a skill-based thing. If you have the right
parts, + and + and you own a brand new wakisashi.

Talies the Wanderer
